Key: Kotori... seems so busy today.

I wanted to ask her out on a date today, but
if she's all booked up, maybe I should refrain.

I can check up on her in the meantime. I wonder
if Kotori is visiting Reine-san right now.
If I can't find her, then I'll give up.
Kotori always seems so busy...

I wanted to ask her out on a date today, but
if she's all booked up, maybe I should refrain.

I can check up on her in the meantime. If she
doesn't pick up, I'll leave it for now.

Is Kotori here? I don't hear anyone talking.
Anyone there?

Oh, there's Kotori. Looks like she's deep in
thought or something. Maybe I shouldn't bother
her.
Hm...? Oh, Shido.
Y-Yo...

What is it? Did you have more business with
Reine?
No. This time it was with you, but...
But what?

You seemed so busy. You don't have time
for a date, do you?
R-Right. Sorry, it's just...
Oh. Don't worry about it.
I'll invite someone else today then.
Later...
...Wait.
I'm going on a date with you.
Huh? B-but I thought you were busy...
I told you I'm going!
I felt stuck anyways... I need a little break.
I-I see... Then let's go.
Okay, let's.

All right. Now that we're in town, where should
we go? Wanna grab a bite?
...Yeah.
Huh...? Kotori...?
Oh... huh? O-Oh yeah... Sorry, what is it?
I was asking if you wanted to grab a bite.
Right. I'll eat whatever you want to eat.
Aren't you craving anything?
Nothing in particular.
Then, how about that...?
That? You mean the taiyaki stall?
I'll buy some, so wait right here.
Sure.
Sorry for the wait... H-Hey, Kotori?!
What's the matter?! Do you feel sick?
Don't shout. It'll give me a headache.
Oh. S-Sorry, b-but...

Honestly, I feel sick. I want to lay down,
but...
Sorry. Let me be for just a little longer.
Kotori...
I'm fine. I'm fine...

(Kotori... looks like a ghost. Is it a good idea
for me to let her be...?)

(If she says she's fine, then that's all that
matters. But, what if she's not...?)
Ask her to take a rest.
Lend a hand.
Kotori, take it easy.

O-Okay. Sorry. We're on a date and this is
what happens.
Don't worry about that. Your health comes first.
Th-Thanks...
...How do you feel? A bit better?
Y-Yeah, kinda...
Cool. We should head home to let you rest.
...Right.
Can you walk?
Somehow...
Then let's go home.
Okay... Sorry.
Hm? Did you say something?
Nothing. Don't worry about it.
O-Okay...
(I wonder if Kotori really is okay...)

(Maybe Kotori's right. She'll feel better in
no time, but... what if she doesn't?)
Sorry, Kotori.
Huh...? A-Aah!
Wh-What are you doing?! Let me down.
Sorry, I can't do that.
WHAT?! Wh-what did you just say?
You barely ever let it slip when you're sick.
I can't just let you live this way...
B-But I'm embarrassed...

Who cares about that? Health comes first.
If you're actually embarrassed, just bury
your face in my back so no one sees you.

If I can't help you at a time like this, what's
the point in me being your big brother?
...Shido.
...You're so dumb.
I know.
How much of a sister complex do you have?
You got a problem with that?
No, but...
Then, be still.
...Okay.

Hey, Kotori? If you're sick, you don't have to
answer, but...

Do you remember doing this when we
were little?

Remember when you fell in the park and
cut your knee?

Back then, I panicked because I let you
get hurt.
I need to get her to a doctor immediately!\nWhat if she needs surgery?!\n...I remember saying that.

It was a just a scratch though, obviously...
Haha. Didn't stop me from panicking.
Which means you haven't changed a bit since.

On the contrary, you've sure grown up.
But I hoped that I'd be grown by now too,
you know?
You're fine just the way you are, Shido.
Oh, yeah? I sure hope that's true.
It is... I don't want you to change.
Kotori...

Besides, I haven't changed as much as you
suggest.

No, you've totally changed. Your mouth is
bigger, and you're meaner.

(Oops. I should say something good about
her.)

Oh, but uh... In a sense, you've gotten cuter
at least...
What?! Wh-What did you just say?
N-Nothing!
S-Say it again!
I refuse!
Jeez, you're such a coward.
Shut up!

Um, I guess you're right, but I still don't think
I've changed much.
Because... from that moment, I've...
...Kotori?
We're home, Kotori.
You can let me down now.
Really?
...Yeah.

Anyways Shido, I told you I didn't want to, but
you forced me to piggyback you in public.
W-Well, I was just desperate to help.
...I know that.

Um. Thanks, Shido. I felt safe with you carrying
me. Now, I feel so much better.
O-Okay...
And... you have changed, though you can't tell.

I never realized how much bigger your back
is. Hadn't noticed at all.

Oh, yeah. Well, my body's gone through some
changes since we were kids.
...Want to go inside?
Okay.
